thread.title: Orange County’s new wetlands ordinance aims to protect ‘earth’s kidneys’ | Nation/World | gazettextra.com
thread.title_full: Orange County’s new wetlands ordinance aims to protect ‘earth’s kidneys’ | Nation/World | gazettextra.com

author: Stephen Hudak - Orlando Sentinel (TNS)
title: Orange County’s new wetlands ordinance aims to protect ‘earth’s kidneys’ | Nation/World | gazettextra.com
text: Orange County is strengthening its protections for the area’s vast expanse of wetlands, delicate but critical natural areas often imperiled by pressure for new development. The updated rules, effective June 1, were two years in the making but won unanimous approval at the county board’s final meeting of 2023. kAm(6E=2?5D[ D@>6E:>6D 42==65 E96 62CE9’D H2E6C E92E 7=@HD E9C@F89 E96>[ 244@F?E 7@C `ea[___ 24C6D[ 23@FE 2 BF2CE6C @7 E96 4@F?EJ’D 2C62[ 3FE 92G6 D9CF? :?8 E@ 6?G:C@?>6?E2= 8C@FAD]k^Am kAm%96J 2=D@ 96=A AC6G6?E ?6:893@C9@@5 7=@@5:?8 3J 23D@C3:?8 CF?@77 7C@> 962GJ C2:?D]k^Am kAm“|@DE @7 @FC FA=2?5D 2C6 2=C625J 56G6=@A65 2?5 D@ E92E =62G6D >@DE=J =@H6C H6E 2C62D[” D2:5 s63@C29 vC66?[ AC6D:56?E @7 ~C2?86 pF5F3@?[ H9:49 6?5@CD65 C6G:D:@? @7 E96 bd\J62C\@=5 @C5:?2?46] “tG6?
